COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a
STRING: Practicing with Fal yesterday helped me settle down a
little.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180
STRING: Arietta's letter, which unexpectedly brought words of
parting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c
STRING: I still hadn't written a response to it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x198
STRING: The turn of events didn't quite go as Arie had detailed,
but I was definitely going to write a response, someday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d2
STRING: [Fal] “Okay then, shall we call it a day?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e8
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fe
STRING: I was comfortably tired, and felt like I could just go
home and crash on my bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x214
STRING: And then, I'd wake up and start practicing, and we'd
rehearse like crazy until Fal had to go to work.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22a
STRING: That was the only conceivable routine for me right now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x252
STRING: [Fal] “Hey, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x268
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x286
STRING: [Fal] “I was just wondering, that if you're feeling up to

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29c
STRING: [Chris] “...Uh-huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ba
STRING: [Fal] “That we could have dinner or something tonight?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d0
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Oh, sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e6
STRING: I started to feel defensive for a moment, thinking that
she was going to ask me if something had happened
recently, but it seemed I was wrong.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fc
STRING: Feeling relieved, I answered before actually thinking
about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x308
STRING: But I had no problems with doing something along the
lines of dinner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31e
STRING: Hearing my response, Fal showed a slightly relieved
smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x350
STRING: [Fal] “I don't know if something happened or not, but
let's eat something nice, and refresh ourselves. You look
pretty tired, so I was a little worried about you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37a
STRING: Fal closed her mouth the moment she finished
speaking, as if she regretted it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a4
STRING: She was trying not to say anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b0
STRING: That is what her eyes suggested to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3bc
STRING: She probably realized that she indirectly admitted that
she was trying to hide the fact she thought something
had happened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3dc
STRING: But, reciprocating the consideration she showed me, I
didn't deny it and instead continued the conversation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f2
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry to make you worry. You're right, I'm a little
out of it. But, I totally agree with the idea of eating
something nice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x438
STRING: [Fal] “...Are you getting tired?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44e
STRING: [Chris] “Hm? Yeah, we just finished rehearsal after all.
But, I don't mind if we keep practicing after we eat...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48a
STRING: [Fal] “In that case, I'll cook something for you. I'll make
enough so you can eat some tomorrow, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4aa
STRING: [Chris] “Um... You mean, cook something at my place?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c8
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, but you don't have to say yes if you don't
want to...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4de
STRING: [Chris] “No, that's not what I meant.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f4
STRING: I simply thought that this would be a good opportunity
to tell Fal everything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50a
STRING: It wasn't the kind of thing I should talk about at a place
like Copert or another restaurant, and it wouldn't be fair
to just suddenly go over to Fal's.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x52a
STRING: So, if she wanted to come over to my place, I couldn't
imagine a better opportunity to talk about it all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x540
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, are you sure you don't mind?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55e
STRING: [Fal] “As long as you don't, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x58c
STRING: I was the one who
suggested it in the first place...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a2
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks. Well, shall we get going?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d4
STRING: [Fal] “Y-Yes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x61e
STRING: It had been raining heavily since last night, but now it
didn't seem so bad.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x634
STRING: Unlike the last time that Fal came over, I wasn't ready at
all today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x64a
STRING: I decided to go home via the main street, so that we
could pick up some groceries.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ac
STRING: There was a section of the street with a number of
grocery stories that I used often, albeit not always.
Upon arriving, I asked Fal for her advice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6cc
STRING: [Chris] “I usually do my grocery shopping around here,
but I don't suppose you know any better places?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f4
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, I usually shop around here too. I think this is
probably the cheapest place around here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x714
STRING: [Chris] “Oh really? I usually just buy whatever, so I never
really compared any of them.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x750
STRING: [Fal] “There's this place and one more, but that one's a
little more expensive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x788
STRING: Oh, and the shops in the New
District are another story, so we'll just ignore
those.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x79e
STRING: Telling me about these kind of things, Fal looked at the
vegetables lined up in the store.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d0
STRING: [Fal] “I come here almost every day, but we haven't run
into each other, have we?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f0
STRING: Fal didn't take her eyes off the vegetables as she spoke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7fc
STRING: [Chris] “‘Usually’ probably wasn't the right word. I don't
actually come here every day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x824
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, is that so?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x83a
STRING: [Chris] “Just after school, or sometimes I come on a day
off and buy a whole lot at once.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x876
STRING: [Fal] “It's probably cheaper to buy things regularly, and
if you come late at night just before they close, they'll
often give you a discount.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x896
STRING: [Chris] “Ohh, I've heard about that before, but I never
really come here at that time of night.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d2
STRING: [Fal] “That's no good. These little things are all
important if you want life to go smoothly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f2
STRING: [Chris] “Aha-ha. You know, I feel like I've seen another
side of you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x92e
STRING: [Fal] “Wh-What do you mean by that...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x944
STRING: [Chris] “Ah, take it as a compliment.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x976
STRING: [Fal] “For some reason I just don't feel like I'm being
complimented...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x98c
STRING: [Chris] “Trust me. Anyway, let's finish up our shopping.
I'll leave the menu to you, so get whatever you need.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ac
STRING: Saying this, I passed her my wallet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d4
STRING: [Fal] “Um... This is...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ea
STRING: [Chris] “The least I can do, since I'm getting you to cook
for me. But if you take a look inside, you'll see I don't
have that much, so let's budget it to what I have.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa30
STRING: [Fal] “This is more than enough, but... Let me pay half.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa46
STRING: [Chris] “Fal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa78
STRING: [Fal] “...Yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa8e
STRING: [Chris] “I'm really grateful that you worry about me, and
that you offer to cook for me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaae
STRING: [Chris] “But, there isn't really anything I can do for you in
return... So at least let me cover this kind of thing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaea
STRING: [Fal] “...Okay. I'll cook up something nice, so I hope
you're hungry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb00
STRING: [Chris] “Don't worry about that, I will be.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb28
STRING: After that, I simply followed Fal around, carrying the
increasing number of shopping bags as we walked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb3e
STRING: It seemed that she wasn't exaggerating when she said
shopped around here everyday, it appeared that she
knew the clerks at almost every shop, and chatted with
them as she went about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb5e
STRING: I had a slight expectation deep down that she might try
and haggle a little, but the shop clerks seemed to give
her discounts whether she asked for them or not.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb80
STRING: I suppose it was fair to say she was a regular.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb8e
STRING: Of course they all knew her name, but Fal also
addressed everyone by name in return, too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba6
STRING: Once again, I felt that I had seen a new side of her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc0a
STRING: [Phorni] “Welcome back. You're home late today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc20
STRING: Hearing the sound of the door open, Phorni called out
to me from deep inside my apartment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc36
STRING: [Chris] “I'm home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc4c
STRING: Saying this in a voice that wasn't loud enough to sound
too strange, I took one of the towels near the doorway
and handed it to Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc62
STRING: [Chris] “Here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc94
STRING: [Fal] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc0
STRING: [Phorni] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd6
STRING: From somewhere in my apartment, Phorni let out a
confused voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce4
STRING: Getting a towel for myself out of my dresser, I spoke to
Phorni while pretending to clear my table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcfa
STRING: [Chris] “...I'm home. It all happened suddenly, but Fal
ended up coming over. Seems she's going to cook for
me, like last time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd1a
STRING: [Chris] “After that, we are going to talk about something
important, so I think she'll be here for a while.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd5e
STRING: [Phorni] “...I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd74
STRING: [Chris] “It was all pretty sudden, so I didn't have time to
explain. Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd92
STRING: [Phorni] “It's okay, no problem. Shall I disappear since
I'm in the way?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda8
STRING: [Chris] “...Dummy. You can do as you please, Phorni.
You can stay and listen if you want, or if you'd prefer,
you can disappear.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc8
STRING: [Chris] “But either way I won't be able to talk to you,
sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe04
STRING: [Phorni] “Don't apologize.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe32
STRING: I'll find a way to pass the
time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe48
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay, thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe96
STRING: [Fal] “Thanks for the towel.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeac
STRING: After wiping down her wet uniform and drying her hair,
Fal carefully folded up the towel she had used and
handed it back to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xecc
STRING: [Chris] “You're welcome.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xefe
STRING: [Fal] “Did you say something just now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf14
STRING: [Chris] “Hm? Just to myself. Don't mind me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf32
STRING: [Fal] “Really? Well, if you say so...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf48
STRING: [Chris] “So, are you ready to start cooking?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf7a
STRING: [Fal] “I can begin anytime. I kept the costs down, so I'll
make the same thing... Actually, I'll make something
even better than last time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf9a
STRING: [Chris] “I can't wait. Is there anything I can help with?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb8
STRING: [Fal] “Nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfce
STRING: [Chris] “So what should I do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfec
STRING: [Fal] “If you feel bored, you could always play your
Fortelle while you wait.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1002
STRING: [Chris] “Practice? At this hour?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1034
STRING: [Fal] “No, I just want to hear you play something.
Anything will do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1054
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1086
STRING: [Fal] “Well, I'll try to be quick, so just wait a little
longer, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x109e
STRING: Rolling up the sleeves of her uniform, Fal headed into
the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10aa
STRING: I sat down at my Fortelle as Fal asked, and for a brief
moment, I wondered about what to play.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c8
STRING: But, it was as if my choice of song had already been
decided.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10f0
STRING: [Phorni] “She said anything will do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1106
STRING: [Chris] “Ohh, anything, you say?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1138
STRING: [Phorni] “Ah, wait, wait!

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1166
STRING: Anything, means that our song
is okay too, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x117c
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay, okay, don't worry I know what you
mean.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ae
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmph! You knew all along but you were just
being mean.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c4
STRING: [Chris] “I can't help it, it's cute when you get angry like
that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ec
STRING: [Phorni] “Fine, I won't sing with you then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1202
STRING: [Chris] “Do as you like, I'll just play by myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1234
STRING: [Phorni] “Urgh... Okay, I'll sing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x124a
STRING: [Chris] “As you wish.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x127c
STRING: [Phorni] “Mmm, ooh-uuh-aah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b8
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, is that the song you wrote? I've only heard it
once, haven't I?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d8
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, that's right. Good memory!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ee
STRING: I raised my voice a little to reply to Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1310
STRING: [Fal] “I usually never forget a song. Especially one that
left an impression.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1330
STRING: [Chris] “Well... Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1362
STRING: [Phorni] “C'mon, quick!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1378
STRING: [Chris] “...I know, I know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x138e
STRING: I felt somewhat nervous, not as much as I would if I was
playing for Ms. Cordell, but it still felt different to when I
practiced or just played on my own.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ae
STRING: The only thing that was a shame was the fact that Fal
couldn't hear Phorni sing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c4
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, here I go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13f6
STRING: [Phorni] “Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x143e
STRING: And in this way, time passed in the blink of an eye, and
the night soon became late.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1456
STRING: It was a nice break from our usual practice, as we
played random songs that we knew. Fal even
improvised some on the spot.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x146c
STRING: It seemed that Phorni had also enjoyed herself,
harmonizing her voice with Fal's and overlaying her own
during the songs.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1484
STRING: Phorni had to warn me sometimes when I almost forgot
that Fal couldn't see her, but in the end everything went
smoothly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14b2
STRING: And then...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1504
STRING: [Fal] “Okay, I should probably get going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x151a
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Before you do...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1530
STRING: There was something I had to tell her, the main reason
why I had her come over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1562
STRING: [Fal] “Hm? What is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1578
STRING: [Phorni] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x158e
STRING: Perhaps Phorni knew what was coming, as she held her
breath and looked at me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x159a
STRING: We had already discussed this matter, and as she had
surely said for me to do as I please, I just gave her a
small smile in response.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15b0
STRING: [Chris] “You asked me if something had happened.
Would you like to hear the answer?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ec
STRING: [Fal] “Uhm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1602
STRING: [Chris] “Actually... Sorry, I didn't mean to ask if you
wanted to hear it or not... I just thought that I should
tell you about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1634
STRING: [Fal] “...I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x164a
STRING: Fal had already stood up to leave, but it seemed that
she realized this was going to take some time, so she
sat herself down in her chair again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x167e
STRING: [Fal] “Is this about Arietta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1694
STRING: [Chris] “...Is it that easy to tell?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c6
STRING: [Fal] “Well, I can't really think of any other things that
could possibly trouble you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16e6
STRING: [Chris] “...I guess you've got a point there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1718
STRING: [Fal] “I wonder if it's because of me that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x172e
STRING: [Chris] “No. It's not like it's your fault in particular, or
anything like that really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x176a
STRING: [Fal] “Then...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1780
STRING: [Chris] “Umm... It's kind of hard to explain, but if I don't
then it will probably create a misunderstanding.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17a8
STRING: [Fal] “A misunderstanding?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17be
STRING: [Chris] “It's not an issue of whose fault it is or why...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17f0
STRING: [Fal] “Wait a minute. That sounds a lot like it's...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1806
STRING: [Chris] “It's not. Really. But, I won't say that it has
nothing to do with you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1858
STRING: [Chris] “But, I'm the one who created the cause of it all,
and Arietta is the one who decided everything.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1894
STRING: [Fal] “That can't be right, I'm clearly part of it...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18aa
STRING: [Chris] “Talking about that now isn't going to change
anything. Which was my choice in the first place.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18e0
STRING: [Chris] “This is why I wanted to make it clear, so that
there are no misunderstandings.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18f6
STRING: [Chris] “The problem is between Arietta and me, there's
nothing that you should feel responsible about.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x191e
STRING: [Fal] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1934
STRING: [Chris] “And besides.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x194a
STRING: I spoke over Fal, so as to stop her from saying any
more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1956
STRING: The things I was going to talk about were still a bit
fuzzy to me, things that I hadn't completely processed in
my own mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x196c
STRING: [Chris] “And besides, I didn't say that we have broken
up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x199e
STRING: [Fal] “...Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19b4
STRING: [Chris] “She said she wanted to break up in the letter
that she wrote. I haven't written a reply yet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19d4
STRING: I wasn't even sure if I intended to reply or not.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19ea
STRING: Or, what I would write.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19fe
STRING: [Fal] “If that's the case, then...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a14
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a32
STRING: [Fal] “What are you going do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a48
STRING: I shook my head, as if to indicate that I didn't have any
more answers.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a5e
STRING: If I didn't have any answers, then why did I even bring it
up?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a74
STRING: Was it for self preservation, or because of the guilt?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a80
STRING: Either way, it wasn't very positive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aa8
STRING: [Fal] “...I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1abe
STRING: For a moment Fal almost seemed as if she was
disappointed, but then she forced herself to smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1af0
STRING: [Fal] “In that case you must be happy. You can still talk
it over.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b10
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b2e
STRING: [Fal] “Don't worry about me, just do what you think is
best for you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b4e
STRING: [Chris] “...That again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b80
STRING: [Fal] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b96
STRING: [Chris] “...Oh, nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bd6
STRING: There it was again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1be2
STRING: What I thought was best.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bee
STRING: Did she really mean it?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bfa
STRING: Or was Fal testing me too, just like Arie did?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c12
STRING: But... I wasn't about to give an answer either way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c28
STRING: I gave an ambiguous nod in response, as a way of
telling Fal that I had nothing else to tell her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c46
STRING: [Chris] “That's it. Sorry, I kind of lost track of what I
wanted to say.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c82
STRING: [Fal] “No, it's okay, I'm happy you shared it with me.
And now I know what has been bothering you. And I'm
happy that you were honest, and told me that you
didn't have answers.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cac
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cde
STRING: [Fal] “But, why did you suddenly decide you wanted to
tell me? Was it because we're partners? Or, was it
because you needed someone to listen?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d08
STRING: [Chris] “Probably neither of those.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d26
STRING: [Fal] “If that's the case, then...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d3c
STRING: [Chris] “I just felt that I should tell you. I didn't want to
keep it from you. And I didn't like the idea of making
you worry either.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d78
STRING: [Fal] “...I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d8e
STRING: Fal simply nodded in response to my awkward words,
and it seemed that she accepted them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da4
STRING: Thinking that this was the end to a long day, I took a
deep breath and let myself relax.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dba
STRING: It had become quite late.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dc6
STRING: [Chris] “I'll walk you home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ddc
STRING: I went to get up out of my seat in order to head out,
but Fal stopped me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e0e
STRING: [Fal] “Wait.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e24
STRING: [Chris] “...What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e56
STRING: [Fal] “I also have something that I want to talk about,
Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e6c
STRING: I sat myself down again, as if to show I was ready to
listen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e78
STRING: [Chris] “What is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eaa
STRING: [Fal] “You asked me if something had happened. Would
you like to hear the answer?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eca
STRING: [Chris] “...Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ee0
STRING: She used the exact same words down to a tee that I
had used earlier.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f12
STRING: [Fal] “You don't remember? The day that I came back to
Piova. At the end of our rehearsal, you asked me if
something had happened, didn't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f3c
STRING: [Chris] “Ahh, that's right, I did...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f52
STRING: But, at the time I felt as if I shouldn't be asking...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f84
STRING: [Fal] “But, you didn't press me any further, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f9a
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fcc
STRING: [Fal] “Would you mind if I told you about it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fe2
STRING: [Chris] “Only if you want to talk about it. If you feel
comfortable telling me about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x201e
STRING: [Fal] “In that case I'll tell you. It's not a very pleasant
story, mind you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2034
STRING: Fal grimaced, almost as if she was mocking herself, and
then began to speak.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2048
STRING: [Fal] “I... Was an orphan.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x205e
STRING: I wasn't very surprised when I heard her say this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x206a
STRING: I had considered the possibility a number of times, and
it wasn't as if there weren't certain facts that backed it
up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2080
STRING: And furthermore, at least a fraction of the students of
the Piova Communal School of Music was made up of
orphans.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2096
STRING: Of course, there were many students in the Fortelle
course who were exempted from their tuition, as it
required specific talents.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ac
STRING: But even in other courses, there were students who
could receive special treatment if they had connections
to members of staff,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 20ac
STRING: or if their ability was recognized by certain
teachers.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20cc
STRING: I imagined that Fal was probably one of these students.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20e0
STRING: [Fal] “You don't look very surprised.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20f6
STRING: [Chris] “I guess I'm not.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2128
STRING: [Fal] “Is it that easy to tell?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x213e
STRING: Fal laughed a little as she said it, copying the words I
had used earlier.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2154
STRING: [Chris] “I had the feeling that might be the case. I
couldn't think of any of reason why you'd be working at
a time like this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2190
STRING: [Fal] “That's true.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21be
STRING: But, it seems there's a lot of students
like me at the school.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21d4
STRING: [Chris] “I've heard stories like that before. But I don't
think I knew of anyone like that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2210
STRING: [Fal] “Really?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x223e
STRING: I guess you don't... Anyway, we were
talking about what happened, weren't we?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2254
STRING: She turned away slightly, and moved her gaze about, as
if she was sifting through her memories.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2286
STRING: [Fal] “I told you I went back to my hometown at the end
of the year, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x229c
STRING: [Chris] “That's right... But you said hometown...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22ce
STRING: [Fal] “You've heard of shelters that take in children who
for whatever reason, can no longer live with their
parents, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22f8
STRING: [Chris] “I think so, yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x232a
STRING: [Fal] “That's where I went back to. They asked me to
visit them.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x234a
STRING: [Chris] “...Why did they ask that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x237c
STRING: [Fal] “Because it will encourage the kids there. Orphans
like me don't have many options for the future. Only the
ones like me who were recognized with talent can
find happiness.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23a6
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23d8
STRING: [Fal] “No, I understand that's not the only way to be
happy. But, it's the dream of that that is important for
us.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2414
STRING: [Fal] “So, I decided to show my face for a change. I
went back and cooked and sang for them.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2434
STRING: [Chris] “...But in that case, why were you depressed?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2466
STRING: [Fal] “Because there's nothing I can do for them.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x247c
STRING: [Chris] “What do you mean, nothing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x249a
STRING: [Fal] “I can't do anything for them, nothing. Even though
I'm in the same position as them, all I can do is sing...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24ba
STRING: [Chris] “Is someone expecting anything more than that
from you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24ec
STRING: [Fal] “...Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2502
STRING: [Chris] “Does someone expect you to do more than sing
for them, and give those children hope?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x253e
STRING: [Fal] “Uh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2554
STRING: [Chris] “If there isn't, then don't you think what you've
done is enough?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2580
STRING: [Chris] “I don't really know what you and those kids
have been through, so it might be a bit strange for
someone like me to comment, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25a0
STRING: [Chris] “I kind of think the fact that you went there, that
you sang for them means that you were able to do
something for them.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25de
STRING: And with a smile, I added something else as Fal was still
silently looking for an answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25f4
STRING: [Chris] “And, I think it'll be even better when you do an
excellent job with the graduation recital, and then
become a professional musician.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2632
STRING: Fal stared at me with a surprised expression on her
face, and then finally regained her ability to smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2664
STRING: [Fal] “...You're right. And in order to do that, I'll have to
work hard.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x267a
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2690
STRING: I nodded strongly, swearing to myself that I would truly
do just that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x269c
STRING: And to finish up with a joke, I tried copying Fal's words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26a8
STRING: [Chris] “But, why did you suddenly decide you wanted
to tell me? Was it because we're partners? Or, was it
because you needed someone to listen?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26ee
STRING: [Fal] “...Hmm, probably neither of those.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2704
STRING: [Chris] “Then...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2736
STRING: [Fal] “I just wanted you to know, I guess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x275a
STRING: Fal had already stood up and was getting ready to go
home, so I didn't see the expression that was on her
face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2770
STRING: While I was getting ready to head out in order to walk
Fal home, Phorni sat herself on top of my jacket, and
looked at me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27a2
STRING: [Phorni] “You're gonna have to work real hard.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27b8
STRING: [Chris] “...Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27ce
STRING: I responded in a small voice, and Phorni nodded as if
she were satisfied, and then disappeared.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27f0
STRING: I grabbed my jacket, and then headed to the entrance
to my apartment where Fal was waiting for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2806
STRING: [Chris] “Time to head out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x281c
STRING: I said this to Phorni, even though I wasn't sure if she
was listening or not, and the closed the door on my way
out.
